name: Dangerous Goods Management Ltd
about: Dangerous Goods Management Ltd (DGM) is a global leader in providing high-quality and practical training courses for the transport, handling, and storage of dangerous goods and hazardous materials. Accredited by local Civil Aviation Authorities, IATA, and ICAO, DGM offers comprehensive training programs tailored to specific job functions, including IATA DGR categories, road, sea, rail, and multimodal transport. With a focus on the Competency Based Training and Assessment (CBTA) approach, DGM ensures a competent workforce by integrating knowledge, skills, and attitude. Training is available in various formats, including classroom sessions in Atlanta, Dallas, and Houston, as well as online and webinar options. DGM's commitment to safety and compliance has earned it a ranking as one of IATA's Top Ten Accredited Training Schools. DGM is dedicated to enhancing safety and efficiency in the transport of dangerous goods worldwide.
